alert.note: Alert for Carson; Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 7:20PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Carson and northwestern Gray Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 719 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of White Deer, or 9 miles east of Panhandle, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pampa, Panhandle, White Deer and Kingsmill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
